   18: -module(rlx_extended_bin_SUITE).
   19: 
   20: -export([suite/0,
   21:          init_per_suite/1,
   22:          end_per_suite/1,
   23:          init_per_testcase/2,
   24:          all/0,
   25:          ping/1,
   26:          shortname_ping/1,
   27:          longname_ping/1,
   28:          attach/1,
   29:          pid/1,
   30:          restart/1,
   31:          reboot/1,
   32:          escript/1,
   33:          remote_console/1,
   34:          replace_os_vars/1,
   35:          replace_os_vars_multi_node/1,
   36:          replace_os_vars_included_config/1,
   37:          replace_os_vars_custom_location/1,
   38:          replace_os_vars_dev_mode/1,
   39:          replace_os_vars_twice/1,
   40:          custom_start_script_hooks/1,
   41:          builtin_wait_for_vm_start_script_hook/1,
   42:          builtin_pid_start_script_hook/1,
   43:          builtin_wait_for_process_start_script_hook/1,
   44:          mixed_custom_and_builtin_start_script_hooks/1]).
   45: 
   46: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   47: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl").
   48: -include_lib("kernel/include/file.hrl").
   49: 
   50: suite() ->
   51:     [{timetrap,{seconds,30}}].
   52: 
   53: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   54:     Config.
   55: 
   56: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   57:     ok.
   58: 
   59: init_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
   60:     DataDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), ?MODULE),
   61:     LibDir1 = filename:join([DataDir, rlx_test_utils:create_random_name("lib_dir1_")]),
   62:     ok = rlx_util:mkdir_p(LibDir1),
   63:     State = rlx_state:new([], [{lib_dirs, [LibDir1]}], [release]),
   64:     {ok, State1} = rlx_config:do(State),
   65:     [{lib1, LibDir1},
   66:      {state, State1} | Config].
   67: 
   68: all() ->
   69:     [ping, shortname_ping, longname_ping, attach, pid, restart, reboot, escript,
   70:      remote_console, replace_os_vars, replace_os_vars_multi_node, replace_os_vars_included_config,
   71:      replace_os_vars_custom_location, replace_os_vars_dev_mode, replace_os_vars_twice, custom_start_script_hooks,
   72:      builtin_wait_for_vm_start_script_hook, builtin_pid_start_script_hook,
   73:      builtin_wait_for_process_start_script_hook, mixed_custom_and_builtin_start_script_hooks].
   74: 
   75: ping(Config) ->
   76:     LibDir1 = proplists:get_value(lib1, Config),
   77: 
   78:     rlx_test_utils:create_app(LibDir1, "goal_app", "0.0.1", [stdlib,kernel], []),
   79: 
   80:     ConfigFile = filename:join([LibDir1, "relx.config"]),
   81:     rlx_test_utils:write_config(ConfigFile,
   82:                  [{release, {foo, "0.0.1"},
   83:                    [goal_app]},
   84:                   {lib_dirs, [filename:join(LibDir1, "*")]},
   85:                   {generate_start_script, true},
   86:                   {extended_start_script, true}
   87:                  ]),
   88: 
   89:     OutputDir = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
   90:                                rlx_test_utils:create_random_name("relx-output")]),
   91: 
   92:     {ok, _State} = relx:do([{relname, foo},
   93:                            {relvsn, "0.0.1"},
   94:                            {goals, []},
   95:                            {lib_dirs, [LibDir1]},
   96:                            {log_level, 3},
   97:                            {output_dir, OutputDir},
   98:                            {config, ConfigFile}], ["release"]),
   99: 
  100:     %% now start/stop the release to make sure the extended script is working
  101:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo start"])),
  102:     timer:sleep(2000),
  103:     {ok, "pong"} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo ping"])),
  104:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo stop"])),
  105:     %% a ping should fail after stopping a node
  106:     {error, 1, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo ping"])).
  107: 
  108: shortname_ping(Config) ->
  109:     LibDir1 = proplists:get_value(lib1, Config),
  110: 
  111:     rlx_test_utils:create_app(LibDir1, "goal_app", "0.0.1", [stdlib,kernel], []),
  112: 
  113:     ConfigFile = filename:join([LibDir1, "relx.config"]),
  114:     VmArgs = filename:join([LibDir1, "vm.args"]),
  115: 
  116:     rlx_test_utils:write_config(ConfigFile,
  117:                  [{release, {foo, "0.0.1"},
  118:                    [goal_app]},
  119:                   {lib_dirs, [filename:join(LibDir1, "*")]},
  120:                   {vm_args, VmArgs},
  121:                   {generate_start_script, true},
  122:                   {extended_start_script, true}
  123:                  ]),
  124:     
  125:     ec_file:write(VmArgs, "-sname foo\n\n"
  126:                           "-setcookie cookie\n"),
  127: 
  128:     OutputDir = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  129:                                rlx_test_utils:create_random_name("relx-output")]),
  130: 
  131:     {ok, _State} = relx:do([{relname, foo},
  132:                            {relvsn, "0.0.1"},
  133:                            {goals, []},
  134:                            {lib_dirs, [LibDir1]},
  135:                            {log_level, 3},
  136:                            {output_dir, OutputDir},
  137:                            {config, ConfigFile}], ["release"]),
  138: 
  139:     %% now start/stop the release to make sure the extended script is working
  140:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo start"])),
  141:     timer:sleep(2000),
  142:     {ok, "pong"} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo ping"])),
  143:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo stop"])),
  144:     %% a ping should fail after stopping a node
  145:     {error, 1, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo ping"])).
  146: 
  147: longname_ping(Config) ->
  148:     LibDir1 = proplists:get_value(lib1, Config),
  149: 
  150:     rlx_test_utils:create_app(LibDir1, "goal_app", "0.0.1", [stdlib,kernel], []),
  151: 
  152:     ConfigFile = filename:join([LibDir1, "relx.config"]),
  153:     VmArgs = filename:join([LibDir1, "vm.args"]),
  154: 
  155:     rlx_test_utils:write_config(ConfigFile,
  156:                  [{release, {foo, "0.0.1"},
  157:                    [goal_app]},
  158:                   {lib_dirs, [filename:join(LibDir1, "*")]},
  159:                   {vm_args, VmArgs},
  160:                   {generate_start_script, true},
  161:                   {extended_start_script, true}
  162:                  ]),
  163:     
  164:     ec_file:write(VmArgs, "-name foo\n\n"
  165:                           "-setcookie cookie\n"),
  166: 
  167:     OutputDir = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  168:                                rlx_test_utils:create_random_name("relx-output")]),
  169: 
  170:     {ok, _State} = relx:do([{relname, foo},
  171:                            {relvsn, "0.0.1"},
  172:                            {goals, []},
  173:                            {lib_dirs, [LibDir1]},
  174:                            {log_level, 3},
  175:                            {output_dir, OutputDir},
  176:                            {config, ConfigFile}], ["release"]),
  177: 
  178:     %% now start/stop the release to make sure the extended script is working
  179:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo start"])),
  180:     timer:sleep(2000),
  181:     {ok, "pong"} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo ping"])),
  182:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo stop"])),
  183:     %% a ping should fail after stopping a node
  184:     {error, 1, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo ping"])).
  185: 
  186: attach(Config) ->
  187:     LibDir1 = proplists:get_value(lib1, Config),
  188: 
  189:     rlx_test_utils:create_app(LibDir1, "goal_app", "0.0.1", [stdlib,kernel], []),
  190: 
  191:     ConfigFile = filename:join([LibDir1, "relx.config"]),
  192:     rlx_test_utils:write_config(ConfigFile,
  193:                  [{release, {foo, "0.0.1"},
  194:                    [goal_app]},
  195:                   {lib_dirs, [filename:join(LibDir1, "*")]},
  196:                   {generate_start_script, true},
  197:                   {extended_start_script, true}
  198:                  ]),
  199: 
  200:     OutputDir = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  201:                                rlx_test_utils:create_random_name("relx-output")]),
  202: 
  203:     {ok, _State} = relx:do([{relname, foo},
  204:                            {relvsn, "0.0.1"},
  205:                            {goals, []},
  206:                            {lib_dirs, [LibDir1]},
  207:                            {log_level, 3},
  208:                            {output_dir, OutputDir},
  209:                            {config, ConfigFile}], ["release"]),
  210: 
  211:     %% now start/stop the release to make sure the extended script is working
  212:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo start"])),
  213:     timer:sleep(2000),
  214:     {ok, "pong"} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo ping"])),
  215:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo attach", "&"])),
  216:     timer:sleep(2000),
  217:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo stop"])),
  218:     {error, 1, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo ping"])).
  219: 
  220: pid(Config) ->
  221:     LibDir1 = proplists:get_value(lib1, Config),
  222: 
  223:     rlx_test_utils:create_app(LibDir1, "goal_app", "0.0.1", [stdlib,kernel], []),
  224: 
  225:     ConfigFile = filename:join([LibDir1, "relx.config"]),
  226:     rlx_test_utils:write_config(ConfigFile,
  227:                  [{release, {foo, "0.0.1"},
  228:                    [goal_app]},
  229:                   {lib_dirs, [filename:join(LibDir1, "*")]},
  230:                   {generate_start_script, true},
  231:                   {extended_start_script, true}
  232:                  ]),
  233: 
  234:     OutputDir = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  235:                                rlx_test_utils:create_random_name("relx-output")]),
  236: 
  237:     {ok, _State} = relx:do([{relname, foo},
  238:                            {relvsn, "0.0.1"},
  239:                            {goals, []},
  240:                            {lib_dirs, [LibDir1]},
  241:                            {log_level, 3},
  242:                            {output_dir, OutputDir},
  243:                            {config, ConfigFile}], ["release"]),
  244: 
  245:     %% check for a valid pid
  246:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo start"])),
  247:     timer:sleep(2000),
  248:     {ok, "pong"} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo ping"])),
  249:     {ok, _Pid} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo pid"])),
  250:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo stop"])),
  251:     {error, 1, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo ping"])).
  252: 
  253: restart(Config) ->
  254:     LibDir1 = proplists:get_value(lib1, Config),
  255: 
  256:     rlx_test_utils:create_app(LibDir1, "goal_app", "0.0.1", [stdlib,kernel], []),
  257: 
  258:     ConfigFile = filename:join([LibDir1, "relx.config"]),
  259:     rlx_test_utils:write_config(ConfigFile,
  260:                  [{release, {foo, "0.0.1"},
  261:                    [goal_app]},
  262:                   {lib_dirs, [filename:join(LibDir1, "*")]},
  263:                   {generate_start_script, true},
  264:                   {extended_start_script, true}
  265:                  ]),
  266: 
  267:     OutputDir = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  268:                                rlx_test_utils:create_random_name("relx-output")]),
  269: 
  270:     {ok, _State} = relx:do([{relname, foo},
  271:                            {relvsn, "0.0.1"},
  272:                            {goals, []},
  273:                            {lib_dirs, [LibDir1]},
  274:                            {log_level, 3},
  275:                            {output_dir, OutputDir},
  276:                            {config, ConfigFile}], ["release"]),
  277: 
  278:     %% a restart is a gracious operation that does not involve the
  279:     %% death of the VM, so the pid should be the same
  280:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo start"])),
  281:     timer:sleep(2000),
  282:     {ok, "pong"} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo ping"])),
  283:     {ok, Pid1} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo pid"])),
  284:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo restart"])),
  285:     timer:sleep(2000),
  286:     {ok, Pid2} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo pid"])),
  287:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo stop"])),
  288:     {error, 1, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo ping"])),
  289:     ?assertEqual(Pid1, Pid2).
  290: 
  291: reboot(Config) ->
  292:     LibDir1 = proplists:get_value(lib1, Config),
  293: 
  294:     rlx_test_utils:create_app(LibDir1, "goal_app", "0.0.1", [stdlib,kernel], []),
  295: 
  296:     ConfigFile = filename:join([LibDir1, "relx.config"]),
  297:     rlx_test_utils:write_config(ConfigFile,
  298:                  [{release, {foo, "0.0.1"},
  299:                    [goal_app]},
  300:                   {lib_dirs, [filename:join(LibDir1, "*")]},
  301:                   {generate_start_script, true},
  302:                   {extended_start_script, true}
  303:                  ]),
  304: 
  305:     OutputDir = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  306:                                rlx_test_utils:create_random_name("relx-output")]),
  307: 
  308:     {ok, _State} = relx:do([{relname, foo},
  309:                            {relvsn, "0.0.1"},
  310:                            {goals, []},
  311:                            {lib_dirs, [LibDir1]},
  312:                            {log_level, 3},
  313:                            {output_dir, OutputDir},
  314:                            {config, ConfigFile}], ["release"]),
  315: 
  316:     %% a reboot involves stopping the emulator, it needs to be restarted
  317:     %% though
  318:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo start"])),
  319:     timer:sleep(2000),
  320:     {ok, "pong"} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo ping"])),
  321:     {ok, Pid1} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo pid"])),
  322:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo reboot"])),
  323:     timer:sleep(2000),
  324:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo start"])),
  325:     timer:sleep(2000),
  326:     {ok, Pid2} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo pid"])),
  327:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo stop"])),
  328:     {error, 1, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo ping"])),
  329:     ?assertNotEqual(Pid1, Pid2).
  330: 
  331: escript(Config) ->
  332:     LibDir1 = proplists:get_value(lib1, Config),
  333: 
  334:     rlx_test_utils:create_app(LibDir1, "goal_app", "0.0.1", [stdlib,kernel], []),
  335: 
  336:     ConfigFile = filename:join([LibDir1, "relx.config"]),
  337:     rlx_test_utils:write_config(ConfigFile,
  338:                  [{release, {foo, "0.0.1"},
  339:                    [goal_app]},
  340:                   {lib_dirs, [filename:join(LibDir1, "*")]},
  341:                   {generate_start_script, true},
  342:                   {extended_start_script, true}
  343:                  ]),
  344: 
  345:     OutputDir = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  346:                                rlx_test_utils:create_random_name("relx-output")]),
  347: 
  348:     {ok, _State} = relx:do([{relname, foo},
  349:                            {relvsn, "0.0.1"},
  350:                            {goals, []},
  351:                            {lib_dirs, [LibDir1]},
  352:                            {log_level, 3},
  353:                            {output_dir, OutputDir},
  354:                            {config, ConfigFile}], ["release"]),
  355: 
  356:     ok = ec_file:write(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "script.erl"]),
  357:                        [rlx_test_utils:escript_contents()]),
  358: 
  359:     %% now start/stop the release to make sure the extended script is working
  360:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo start"])),
  361:     timer:sleep(2000),
  362:     {ok, "pong"} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo ping"])),
  363:     [ExpectedOutput] = io_lib:format("~s",
  364:                             [filename:join([OutputDir, "foo"])]),
  365:     {ok, Output} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo escript script.erl"])),
  366:     ?assertEqual(ExpectedOutput, Output).
  367: 
  368: remote_console(Config) ->
  369:     LibDir1 = proplists:get_value(lib1, Config),
  370: 
  371:     rlx_test_utils:create_app(LibDir1, "goal_app", "0.0.1", [stdlib,kernel], []),
  372: 
  373:     ConfigFile = filename:join([LibDir1, "relx.config"]),
  374:     rlx_test_utils:write_config(ConfigFile,
  375:                  [{release, {foo, "0.0.1"},
  376:                    [goal_app]},
  377:                   {lib_dirs, [filename:join(LibDir1, "*")]},
  378:                   {generate_start_script, true},
  379:                   {extended_start_script, true}
  380:                  ]),
  381: 
  382:     OutputDir = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  383:                                rlx_test_utils:create_random_name("relx-output")]),
  384: 
  385:     {ok, _State} = relx:do([{relname, foo},
  386:                            {relvsn, "0.0.1"},
  387:                            {goals, []},
  388:                            {lib_dirs, [LibDir1]},
  389:                            {log_level, 3},
  390:                            {output_dir, OutputDir},
  391:                            {config, ConfigFile}], ["release"]),
  392: 
  393:     %% now start/stop the release to make sure the extended script is working
  394:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo start"])),
  395:     timer:sleep(2000),
  396:     {ok, "pong"} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo ping"])),
  397:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo remote_console &"])),
  398:     timer:sleep(2000),
  399:     {ok, NodesStr} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo eval 'nodes(connected).'"])),
  400:     Nodes = rlx_test_utils:list_to_term(NodesStr),
  401:     ?assertEqual(1, length(Nodes)),
  402:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo stop"])).
  403: 
  404: replace_os_vars(Config) ->
  405:     LibDir1 = proplists:get_value(lib1, Config),
  406: 
  407:     rlx_test_utils:create_app(LibDir1, "goal_app", "0.0.1", [stdlib,kernel], []),
  408: 
  409:     ConfigFile = filename:join([LibDir1, "relx.config"]),
  410:     SysConfig = filename:join([LibDir1, "sys.config"]),
  411:     VmArgs = filename:join([LibDir1, "vm.args"]),
  412: 
  413:     rlx_test_utils:write_config(ConfigFile,
  414:                  [{release, {foo, "0.0.1"},
  415:                    [goal_app]},
  416:                   {lib_dirs, [filename:join(LibDir1, "*")]},
  417:                   {sys_config, SysConfig},
  418:                   {vm_args, VmArgs},
  419:                   {generate_start_script, true},
  420:                   {extended_start_script, true}
  421:                  ]),
  422: 
  423:     rlx_test_utils:write_config(SysConfig,
  424:                                 [[{goal_app, [{var1, "${VAR1}"}]}]]),
  425:     ec_file:write(VmArgs, "-sname ${NODENAME}\n\n"
  426:                           "-setcookie ${COOKIE}\n"),
  427: 
  428:     OutputDir = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  429:                                rlx_test_utils:create_random_name("relx-output")]),
  430: 
  431:     {ok, _State} = relx:do([{relname, foo},
  432:                            {relvsn, "0.0.1"},
  433:                            {goals, []},
  434:                            {lib_dirs, [LibDir1]},
  435:                            {log_level, 3},
  436:                            {output_dir, OutputDir},
  437:                            {config, ConfigFile}], ["release"]),
  438: 
  439:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo start"]),
  440:                  [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  441:                   {"NODENAME", "node1"},
  442:                   {"COOKIE", "cookie1"},
  443:                   {"VAR1", "v1"}]),
  444:     timer:sleep(2000),
  445:     {ok, "pong"} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo ping"]),
  446:                       [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  447:                          {"NODENAME", "node1"},
  448:                          {"COOKIE", "cookie1"}]),
  449:     {ok, "\"v1\""} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
  450:                                        "foo eval '{ok, V} = application:get_env(goal_app, var1), V.'"]),
  451:                         [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  452:                          {"NODENAME", "node1"},
  453:                          {"COOKIE", "cookie1"}]),
  454:     {ok, "\"node1\""} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
  455:                                      "foo eval '[Node,_] = re:split(atom_to_list(node()), \"@\"),binary_to_list(Node).'"]),
  456:                         [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  457:                          {"NODENAME", "node1"},
  458:                          {"COOKIE", "cookie1"}]),
  459:     {ok, "cookie1"} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
  460:                                        "foo eval 'erlang:get_cookie().'"]),
  461:                          [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  462:                           {"NODENAME", "node1"},
  463:                           {"COOKIE", "cookie1"}]),
  464:     {ok, _Node1} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
  465:                                        "foo eval 'atom_to_list(node()).'"]),
  466:                          [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  467:                           {"NODENAME", "node1"},
  468:                           {"COOKIE", "cookie1"}]),
  469:     %% check that the replaced files have been created in the right place
  470:     ?assert(ec_file:exists(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "releases", "0.0.1",
  471:                                           "sys.config"]))),
  472:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo stop"]),
  473:                 [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  474:                  {"NODENAME", "node1"},
  475:                  {"COOKIE", "cookie1"}]),
  476: 
  477:     %% start the node again but this time with different env variables to replace
  478:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo start"]),
  479:                  [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  480:                   {"NODENAME", "node2"},
  481:                   {"COOKIE", "cookie2"},
  482:                   {"VAR1", "v2"}]),
  483:     timer:sleep(2000),
  484:     {ok, "pong"} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo ping"]),
  485:                       [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  486:                          {"NODENAME", "node2"},
  487:                          {"COOKIE", "cookie2"}]),
  488:     {ok, "\"v2\""} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
  489:                                        "foo eval '{ok, V} = application:get_env(goal_app, var1), V.'"]),
  490:                         [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  491:                          {"NODENAME", "node2"},
  492:                          {"COOKIE", "cookie2"}]),
  493:     {ok, "\"node2\""} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
  494:                                      "foo eval '[Node,_] = re:split(atom_to_list(node()), \"@\"),binary_to_list(Node).'"]),
  495:                           [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  496:                            {"NODENAME", "node2"},
  497:                            {"COOKIE", "cookie2"}]),
  498:     {ok, "cookie2"} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
  499:                                        "foo eval 'erlang:get_cookie().'"]),
  500:                          [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  501:                           {"NODENAME", "node2"},
  502:                           {"COOKIE", "cookie2"}]),
  503:     {ok, _Node2} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
  504:                                        "foo eval 'atom_to_list(node()).'"]),
  505:                          [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  506:                           {"NODENAME", "node2"},
  507:                           {"COOKIE", "cookie2"}]),
  508:     %% check that the replaced files have been created in the right place
  509:     ?assert(ec_file:exists(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "releases", "0.0.1",
  510:                                           "sys.config"]))),
  511:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo stop"]),
  512:                          [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  513:                           {"NODENAME", "node2"},
  514:                           {"COOKIE", "cookie2"}]),
  515:     ok.
  516: 
  517: replace_os_vars_multi_node(Config) ->
  518:     LibDir1 = proplists:get_value(lib1, Config),
  519: 
  520:     rlx_test_utils:create_app(LibDir1, "goal_app", "0.0.1", [stdlib,kernel], []),
  521: 
  522:     ConfigFile = filename:join([LibDir1, "relx.config"]),
  523:     SysConfig = filename:join([LibDir1, "sys.config"]),
  524:     VmArgs = filename:join([LibDir1, "vm.args"]),
  525: 
  526:     rlx_test_utils:write_config(ConfigFile,
  527:                  [{release, {foo, "0.0.1"},
  528:                    [goal_app]},
  529:                   {lib_dirs, [filename:join(LibDir1, "*")]},
  530:                   {sys_config, SysConfig},
  531:                   {vm_args, VmArgs},
  532:                   {generate_start_script, true},
  533:                   {extended_start_script, true}
  534:                  ]),
  535: 
  536:     rlx_test_utils:write_config(SysConfig,
  537:                                 [[{goal_app, [{var1, "${VAR1}"}]}]]),
  538:     ec_file:write(VmArgs, "-sname ${NODENAME}\n\n"
  539:                           "-setcookie ${COOKIE}\n"),
  540: 
  541:     OutputDir = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  542:                                rlx_test_utils:create_random_name("relx-output")]),
  543: 
  544:     {ok, _State} = relx:do([{relname, foo},
  545:                            {relvsn, "0.0.1"},
  546:                            {goals, []},
  547:                            {lib_dirs, [LibDir1]},
  548:                            {log_level, 3},
  549:                            {output_dir, OutputDir},
  550:                            {config, ConfigFile}], ["release"]),
  551: 
  552:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo start"]),
  553:                  [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  554:                   {"RELX_MULTI_NODE", "1"},
  555:                   {"NODENAME", "node1"},
  556:                   {"COOKIE", "cookie1"},
  557:                   {"VAR1", "v1"}]),
  558:     timer:sleep(2000),
  559:     {ok, "pong"} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo ping"]),
  560:                       [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  561:                        {"RELX_MULTI_NODE", "1"},
  562:                        {"NODENAME", "node1"},
  563:                        {"COOKIE", "cookie1"}]),
  564:     {ok, "\"v1\""} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
  565:                                        "foo eval '{ok, V} = application:get_env(goal_app, var1), V.'"]),
  566:                         [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  567:                          {"RELX_MULTI_NODE", "1"},
  568:                          {"NODENAME", "node1"},
  569:                          {"COOKIE", "cookie1"}]),
  570:     {ok, "\"node1\""} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
  571:                                      "foo eval '[Node,_] = re:split(atom_to_list(node()), \"@\"),binary_to_list(Node).'"]),
  572:                         [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  573:                          {"RELX_MULTI_NODE", "1"},
  574:                          {"NODENAME", "node1"},
  575:                          {"COOKIE", "cookie1"}]),
  576:     {ok, "cookie1"} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
  577:                                        "foo eval 'erlang:get_cookie().'"]),
  578:                          [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  579:                           {"RELX_MULTI_NODE", "1"},
  580:                           {"NODENAME", "node1"},
  581:                           {"COOKIE", "cookie1"}]),
  582:     {ok, Node1} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
  583:                                        "foo eval 'atom_to_list(node()).'"]),
  584:                          [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  585:                           {"RELX_MULTI_NODE", "1"},
  586:                           {"NODENAME", "node1"},
  587:                           {"COOKIE", "cookie1"}]),
  588:     %% check that the replaced files have been created in the right place
  589:     ?assert(ec_file:exists(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "releases", "0.0.1",
  590:                                           "sys." ++
  591:                                           rlx_test_utils:unescape_string(Node1) ++
  592:                                           ".config"]))),
  593:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo stop"]),
  594:                 [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  595:                  {"RELX_MULTI_NODE", "1"},
  596:                  {"NODENAME", "node1"},
  597:                  {"COOKIE", "cookie1"}]),
  598: 
  599:     %% start the node again but this time with different env variables to replace
  600:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo start"]),
  601:                  [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  602:                   {"RELX_MULTI_NODE", "1"},
  603:                   {"NODENAME", "node2"},
  604:                   {"COOKIE", "cookie2"},
  605:                   {"VAR1", "v2"}]),
  606:     timer:sleep(2000),
  607:     {ok, "pong"} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo ping"]),
  608:                       [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  609:                        {"RELX_MULTI_NODE", "1"},
  610:                        {"NODENAME", "node2"},
  611:                        {"COOKIE", "cookie2"}]),
  612:     {ok, "\"v2\""} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
  613:                                        "foo eval '{ok, V} = application:get_env(goal_app, var1), V.'"]),
  614:                         [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  615:                          {"RELX_MULTI_NODE", "1"},
  616:                          {"NODENAME", "node2"},
  617:                          {"COOKIE", "cookie2"}]),
  618:     {ok, "\"node2\""} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
  619:                                      "foo eval '[Node,_] = re:split(atom_to_list(node()), \"@\"),binary_to_list(Node).'"]),
  620:                           [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  621:                            {"RELX_MULTI_NODE", "1"},
  622:                            {"NODENAME", "node2"},
  623:                            {"COOKIE", "cookie2"}]),
  624:     {ok, "cookie2"} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
  625:                                        "foo eval 'erlang:get_cookie().'"]),
  626:                          [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  627:                           {"RELX_MULTI_NODE", "1"},
  628:                           {"NODENAME", "node2"},
  629:                           {"COOKIE", "cookie2"}]),
  630:     {ok, Node2} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
  631:                                        "foo eval 'atom_to_list(node()).'"]),
  632:                          [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  633:                           {"RELX_MULTI_NODE", "1"},
  634:                           {"NODENAME", "node2"},
  635:                           {"COOKIE", "cookie2"}]),
  636:     %% check that the replaced files have been created in the right place
  637:     ?assert(ec_file:exists(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "releases", "0.0.1",
  638:                                           "sys." ++
  639:                                           rlx_test_utils:unescape_string(Node2) ++
  640:                                           ".config"]))),
  641:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo stop"]),
  642:                          [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  643:                           {"RELX_MULTI_NODE", "1"},
  644:                           {"NODENAME", "node2"},
  645:                           {"COOKIE", "cookie2"}]),
  646:     ok.

  648: replace_os_vars_included_config(Config) ->
  649:     LibDir1 = proplists:get_value(lib1, Config),
  650: 
  651:     rlx_test_utils:create_app(LibDir1, "goal_app", "0.0.1", [stdlib,kernel], []),
  652: 
  653:     ConfigFile = filename:join([LibDir1, "relx.config"]),
  654:     SysConfig = filename:join([LibDir1, "sys.config"]),
  655:     IncludedConfig = filename:join([LibDir1, "config", "included.config"]),
  656:     VmArgs = filename:join([LibDir1, "vm.args"]),
  657: 
  658:     rlx_test_utils:write_config(ConfigFile,
  659:                  [{release, {foo, "0.0.1"},
  660:                    [goal_app]},
  661:                   {lib_dirs, [filename:join(LibDir1, "*")]},
  662:                   {sys_config, SysConfig},
  663:                   {vm_args, VmArgs},
  664:                   {generate_start_script, true},
  665:                   {extended_start_script, true},
  666:                   {overlay, [
  667:                     {mkdir, "releases/{{release_version}}/config"},
  668:                     {template, "config/included.config", "releases/{{release_version}}/config/included.config"}
  669:                   ]}
  670:                  ]),
  671: 
  672:     rlx_test_utils:write_config(IncludedConfig,
  673:                                 [[{goal_app, [
  674:                                               {var1_included, "${VAR1}"}]
  675:                                   }]
  676:                                 ]),
  677:     rlx_test_utils:write_config(SysConfig,
  678:                                 [[{goal_app, [
  679:                                               {var1, "${VAR1}"}]
  680:                                   },
  681:                                  "releases/0.0.1/config/included.config"]
  682:                                 ]),
  683:     ec_file:write(VmArgs, "-sname ${NODENAME}\n\n"
  684:                           "-setcookie ${COOKIE}\n"),
  685: 
  686:     OutputDir = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  687:                                rlx_test_utils:create_random_name("relx-output")]),
  688: 
  689:     {ok, _State} = relx:do([{relname, foo},
  690:                            {relvsn, "0.0.1"},
  691:                            {goals, []},
  692:                            {lib_dirs, [LibDir1]},
  693:                            {log_level, 3},
  694:                            {output_dir, OutputDir},
  695:                            {config, ConfigFile}], ["release"]),
  696: 
  697:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo start"]),
  698:                  [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  699:                   {"NODENAME", "node1"},
  700:                   {"COOKIE", "cookie1"},
  701:                   {"VAR1", "v1"}]),
  702:     timer:sleep(2000),
  703:     {ok, "pong"} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo ping"]),
  704:                       [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  705:                          {"NODENAME", "node1"},
  706:                          {"COOKIE", "cookie1"}]),
  707:     {ok, "\"v1\""} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
  708:                                        "foo eval '{ok, V} = application:get_env(goal_app, var1), V.'"]),
  709:                         [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  710:                          {"NODENAME", "node1"},
  711:                          {"COOKIE", "cookie1"}]),
  712:     {ok, "\"node1\""} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
  713:                                      "foo eval '[Node,_] = re:split(atom_to_list(node()), \"@\"),binary_to_list(Node).'"]),
  714:                         [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  715:                          {"NODENAME", "node1"},
  716:                          {"COOKIE", "cookie1"}]),
  717:     {ok, "cookie1"} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
  718:                                        "foo eval 'erlang:get_cookie().'"]),
  719:                          [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  720:                           {"NODENAME", "node1"},
  721:                           {"COOKIE", "cookie1"}]),
  722:     {ok, _Node1} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
  723:                                        "foo eval 'atom_to_list(node()).'"]),
  724:                          [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  725:                           {"NODENAME", "node1"},
  726:                           {"COOKIE", "cookie1"}]),
  727:     %% check that the replaced files have been created in the right place
  728:     ?assert(ec_file:exists(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "releases", "0.0.1",
  729:                                           "sys.config"]))),
  730:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo stop"]),
  731:                 [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  732:                  {"NODENAME", "node1"},
  733:                  {"COOKIE", "cookie1"}]),
  734: 
  735:     %% start the node again but this time with different env variables to replace
  736:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo start"]),
  737:                  [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  738:                   {"NODENAME", "node2"},
  739:                   {"COOKIE", "cookie2"},
  740:                   {"VAR1", "v2"}]),
  741:     timer:sleep(2000),
  742:     {ok, "pong"} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo ping"]),
  743:                       [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  744:                          {"NODENAME", "node2"},
  745:                          {"COOKIE", "cookie2"}]),
  746:     {ok, "\"v2\""} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
  747:                                        "foo eval '{ok, V} = application:get_env(goal_app, var1), V.'"]),
  748:                         [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  749:                          {"NODENAME", "node2"},
  750:                          {"COOKIE", "cookie2"}]),
  751:     {ok, "\"node2\""} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
  752:                                      "foo eval '[Node,_] = re:split(atom_to_list(node()), \"@\"),binary_to_list(Node).'"]),
  753:                           [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  754:                            {"NODENAME", "node2"},
  755:                            {"COOKIE", "cookie2"}]),
  756:     {ok, "cookie2"} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
  757:                                        "foo eval 'erlang:get_cookie().'"]),
  758:                          [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  759:                           {"NODENAME", "node2"},
  760:                           {"COOKIE", "cookie2"}]),
  761:     {ok, _Node2} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
  762:                                        "foo eval 'atom_to_list(node()).'"]),
  763:                          [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  764:                           {"NODENAME", "node2"},
  765:                           {"COOKIE", "cookie2"}]),
  766:     %% check that the replaced files have been created in the right place
  767:     ?assert(ec_file:exists(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "releases", "0.0.1",
  768:                                           "sys.config"]))),
  769:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo stop"]),

  775: replace_os_vars_custom_location(Config) ->
  776:     LibDir1 = proplists:get_value(lib1, Config),
  777: 
  778:     rlx_test_utils:create_app(LibDir1, "goal_app", "0.0.1", [stdlib,kernel], []),
  779: 
  780:     ConfigFile = filename:join([LibDir1, "relx.config"]),
  781:     SysConfig = filename:join([LibDir1, "sys.config"]),
  782:     VmArgs = filename:join([LibDir1, "vm.args"]),
  783: 
  784:     rlx_test_utils:write_config(ConfigFile,
  785:                  [{release, {foo, "0.0.1"},
  786:                    [goal_app]},
  787:                   {lib_dirs, [filename:join(LibDir1, "*")]},
  788:                   {sys_config, SysConfig},
  789:                   {vm_args, VmArgs},
  790:                   {generate_start_script, true},
  791:                   {extended_start_script, true}
  792:                  ]),
  793: 
  794:     rlx_test_utils:write_config(SysConfig,
  795:                                 [[{goal_app, [{var1, "${VAR1}"}]}]]),
  796:     ec_file:write(VmArgs, "-sname ${NODENAME}\n\n"
  797:                           "-setcookie ${COOKIE}\n"),
  798: 
  799:     OutputDir = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  800:                                rlx_test_utils:create_random_name("relx-output")]),
  801: 
  802:     {ok, _State} = relx:do([{relname, foo},
  803:                            {relvsn, "0.0.1"},
  804:                            {goals, []},
  805:                            {lib_dirs, [LibDir1]},
  806:                            {log_level, 3},
  807:                            {output_dir, OutputDir},
  808:                            {config, ConfigFile}], ["release"]),
  809: 
  810:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo start"]),
  811:                  [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  812:                   {"RELX_OUT_FILE_PATH", "/tmp"},
  813:                   {"NODENAME", "node1"},
  814:                   {"COOKIE", "cookie1"},
  815:                   {"VAR1", "v1"}]),
  816:     timer:sleep(2000),
  817:     {ok, "pong"} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo ping"]),
  818:                       [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  819:                        {"RELX_OUT_FILE_PATH", "/tmp"},
  820:                        {"NODENAME", "node1"},
  821:                        {"COOKIE", "cookie1"}]),
  822:     {ok, "\"v1\""} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
  823:                                        "foo eval '{ok, V} = application:get_env(goal_app, var1), V.'"]),
  824:                         [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  825:                          {"RELX_OUT_FILE_PATH", "/tmp"},
  826:                          {"NODENAME", "node1"},
  827:                          {"COOKIE", "cookie1"}]),
  828:     {ok, "\"node1\""} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
  829:                                      "foo eval '[Node,_] = re:split(atom_to_list(node()), \"@\"),binary_to_list(Node).'"]),
  830:                         [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  831:                          {"RELX_OUT_FILE_PATH", "/tmp"},
  832:                          {"NODENAME", "node1"},
  833:                          {"COOKIE", "cookie1"}]),
  834:     {ok, "cookie1"} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
  835:                                        "foo eval 'erlang:get_cookie().'"]),
  836:                          [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  837:                           {"RELX_OUT_FILE_PATH", "/tmp"},
  838:                           {"NODENAME", "node1"},
  839:                           {"COOKIE", "cookie1"}]),
  840:     {ok, _Node1} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
  841:                                        "foo eval 'atom_to_list(node()).'"]),
  842:                          [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  843:                           {"RELX_OUT_FILE_PATH", "/tmp"},
  844:                           {"NODENAME", "node1"},
  845:                           {"COOKIE", "cookie1"}]),
  846:     %% check that the replaced files have been created in the right place
  847:     ?assert(ec_file:exists(filename:join(["/", "tmp",
  848:                                           "sys.config"]))),
  849:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo stop"]),
  850:                 [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  851:                  {"RELX_OUT_FILE_PATH", "/tmp"},
  852:                  {"NODENAME", "node1"},
  853:                  {"COOKIE", "cookie1"}]),
  854: 
  855:     %% start the node again but this time with different env variables to replace
  856:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo start"]),
  857:                  [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  858:                   {"RELX_OUT_FILE_PATH", "/tmp"},
  859:                   {"NODENAME", "node2"},
  860:                   {"COOKIE", "cookie2"},
  861:                   {"VAR1", "v2"}]),
  862:     timer:sleep(2000),
  863:     {ok, "pong"} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo ping"]),
  864:                       [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  865:                        {"RELX_OUT_FILE_PATH", "/tmp"},
  866:                        {"NODENAME", "node2"},
  867:                        {"COOKIE", "cookie2"}]),
  868:     {ok, "\"v2\""} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
  869:                                        "foo eval '{ok, V} = application:get_env(goal_app, var1), V.'"]),
  870:                         [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  871:                          {"RELX_OUT_FILE_PATH", "/tmp"},
  872:                          {"NODENAME", "node2"},
  873:                          {"COOKIE", "cookie2"}]),
  874:     {ok, "\"node2\""} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
  875:                                      "foo eval '[Node,_] = re:split(atom_to_list(node()), \"@\"),binary_to_list(Node).'"]),
  876:                           [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  877:                            {"RELX_OUT_FILE_PATH", "/tmp"},
  878:                            {"NODENAME", "node2"},
  879:                            {"COOKIE", "cookie2"}]),
  880:     {ok, "cookie2"} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
  881:                                        "foo eval 'erlang:get_cookie().'"]),
  882:                          [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  883:                           {"RELX_OUT_FILE_PATH", "/tmp"},
  884:                           {"NODENAME", "node2"},
  885:                           {"COOKIE", "cookie2"}]),
  886:     {ok, _Node2} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
  887:                                        "foo eval 'atom_to_list(node()).'"]),
  888:                          [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  889:                           {"RELX_OUT_FILE_PATH", "/tmp"},
  890:                           {"NODENAME", "node2"},
  891:                           {"COOKIE", "cookie2"}]),
  892:     %% check that the replaced files have been created in the right place
  893:     ?assert(ec_file:exists(filename:join(["/", "tmp",
  894:                                           "sys.config"]))),
  895:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo stop"]),
  896:                          [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  897:                           {"RELX_OUT_FILE_PATH", "/tmp"},
  898:                           {"NODENAME", "node2"},
  899:                           {"COOKIE", "cookie2"}]),
  900:     ok.
  901: 
  902: replace_os_vars_twice(Config) ->
  903:     LibDir1 = proplists:get_value(lib1, Config),
  904: 
  905:     rlx_test_utils:create_app(LibDir1, "goal_app", "0.0.1", [stdlib,kernel], []),
  906: 
  907:     ConfigFile = filename:join([LibDir1, "relx.config"]),
  908:     SysConfig = filename:join([LibDir1, "sys.config"]),
  909:     VmArgs = filename:join([LibDir1, "vm.args"]),
  910: 
  911:     rlx_test_utils:write_config(ConfigFile,
  912:                  [{release, {foo, "0.0.1"},
  913:                    [goal_app]},
  914:                   {lib_dirs, [filename:join(LibDir1, "*")]},
  915:                   {sys_config, SysConfig},
  916:                   {vm_args, VmArgs},
  917:                   {generate_start_script, true},
  918:                   {extended_start_script, true}
  919:                  ]),
  920: 
  921:     rlx_test_utils:write_config(SysConfig,
  922:                                 [[{goal_app, [{var1, "${VAR1}"}]}]]),
  923:     ec_file:write(VmArgs, "-sname node\n\n"
  924:                           "-setcookie cookie\n"),
  925: 
  926:     OutputDir = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  927:                                rlx_test_utils:create_random_name("relx-output")]),
  928: 
  929:     {ok, _State} = relx:do([{relname, foo},
  930:                             {relvsn, "0.0.1"},
  931:                             {goals, []},
  932:                             {lib_dirs, [LibDir1]},
  933:                             {log_level, 3},
  934:                             {output_dir, OutputDir},
  935:                             {config, ConfigFile}], ["release"]),
  936: 
  937:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo start"]),
  938:                  [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
  939:                   {"VAR1", "v1"}]),
  940:     timer:sleep(2000),
  941:     {ok, "pong"} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo ping"]),
  942:                       [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"}]),
  943:     {ok, "\"v1\""} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
  944:                                        "foo eval '{ok, V} = application:get_env(goal_app, var1), V.'"]),
  945:                        [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"}]),
  946:     {ok, "\"node\""} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
  947:                                      "foo eval '[Node,_] = re:split(atom_to_list(node()), \"@\"),binary_to_list(Node).'"]),
  948:                           [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"}]),
  949:     {ok, "cookie"} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
  950:                                        "foo eval 'erlang:get_cookie().'"]),
  951:                          [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"}]),
  952:     {ok, _Node1} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
  953:                                        "foo eval 'atom_to_list(node()).'"]),
  954:                          [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"}]),
  955:     %% check that the replaced files have been created in the right place
  956:     ?assert(ec_file:exists(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "releases", "0.0.1",
  957:                                           "sys.config"]))),
  958:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo stop"]),
  959:                  [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"}]),
  960: 
  961:     %% start the node again but this time don't replace env variables
  962:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo start"])),
  963:     timer:sleep(2000),
  964:     {ok, "pong"} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo ping"])),
  965:     {ok, "\"${VAR1}\""} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
  966:                                        "foo eval '{ok, V} = application:get_env(goal_app, var1), V.'"])),
  967:     {ok, "\"node\""} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
  968:                                      "foo eval '[Node,_] = re:split(atom_to_list(node()), \"@\"),binary_to_list(Node).'"])),
  969:     {ok, "cookie"} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
  970:                                        "foo eval 'erlang:get_cookie().'"])),
  971:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo stop"])),
  972:     ok.
  973: 
  974: replace_os_vars_dev_mode(Config) ->
  975:     LibDir1 = proplists:get_value(lib1, Config),
  976: 
  977:     rlx_test_utils:create_app(LibDir1, "goal_app", "0.0.1", [stdlib,kernel], []),
  978: 
  979:     ConfigFile = filename:join([LibDir1, "relx.config"]),
  980:     SysConfig = filename:join([LibDir1, "sys.config"]),
  981:     VmArgs = filename:join([LibDir1, "vm.args"]),
  982: 
  983:     rlx_test_utils:write_config(ConfigFile,
  984:                  [{release, {foo, "0.0.1"},
  985:                    [goal_app]},
  986:                   {lib_dirs, [filename:join(LibDir1, "*")]},
  987:                   {sys_config, SysConfig},
  988:                   {vm_args, VmArgs},
  989:                   {dev_mode, true},
  990:                   {generate_start_script, true},
  991:                   {extended_start_script, true}
  992:                  ]),
  993: 
  994:     rlx_test_utils:write_config(SysConfig,
  995:                                 [[{goal_app, [{var1, "${VAR1}"}]}]]),
  996:     ec_file:write(VmArgs, "-sname ${NODENAME}\n\n"
  997:                           "-setcookie ${COOKIE}\n"),
  998: 
  999:     OutputDir = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1000:                                rlx_test_utils:create_random_name("relx-output")]),
 1001: 
 1002:     {ok, _State} = relx:do([{relname, foo},
 1003:                            {relvsn, "0.0.1"},
 1004:                            {goals, []},
 1005:                            {lib_dirs, [LibDir1]},
 1006:                            {log_level, 3},
 1007:                            {output_dir, OutputDir},
 1008:                            {config, ConfigFile}], ["release"]),
 1009: 
 1010:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo start"]),
 1011:                  [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
 1012:                   {"NODENAME", "node1"},
 1013:                   {"COOKIE", "cookie1"},
 1014:                   {"VAR1", "v1"}]),
 1015:     timer:sleep(2000),
 1016:     {ok, "pong"} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo ping"]),
 1017:                       [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
 1018:                          {"NODENAME", "node1"},
 1019:                          {"COOKIE", "cookie1"}]),
 1020:     {ok, "\"v1\""} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
 1021:                                        "foo eval '{ok, V} = application:get_env(goal_app, var1), V.'"]),
 1022:                         [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
 1023:                          {"NODENAME", "node1"},
 1024:                          {"COOKIE", "cookie1"}]),
 1025:     {ok, "\"node1\""} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
 1026:                                      "foo eval '[Node,_] = re:split(atom_to_list(node()), \"@\"),binary_to_list(Node).'"]),
 1027:                           [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
 1028:                            {"NODENAME", "node1"},
 1029:                            {"COOKIE", "cookie1"}]),
 1030:     {ok, "cookie1"} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
 1031:                                        "foo eval 'erlang:get_cookie().'"]),
 1032:                          [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
 1033:                           {"NODENAME", "node1"},
 1034:                           {"COOKIE", "cookie1"}]),
 1035:     {ok, _Node1} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
 1036:                                        "foo eval 'atom_to_list(node()).'"]),
 1037:                          [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
 1038:                           {"NODENAME", "node1"},
 1039:                           {"COOKIE", "cookie1"}]),
 1040:     %% check that the replaced files have been created in the right place
 1041:     ?assert(ec_file:exists(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "releases", "0.0.1",
 1042:                                           "sys.config"]))),
 1043:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo stop"]),
 1044:                  [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
 1045:                   {"NODENAME", "node1"},
 1046:                   {"COOKIE", "cookie1"}]),
 1047:

 1049:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo start"]),
 1050:                  [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
 1051:                   {"NODENAME", "node2"},
 1052:                   {"COOKIE", "cookie2"},
 1053:                   {"VAR1", "v2"}]),
 1054:     timer:sleep(2000),
 1055:     {ok, "pong"} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo ping"]),
 1056:                       [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
 1057:                        {"NODENAME", "node2"},
 1058:                        {"COOKIE", "cookie2"}]),
 1059:     {ok, "\"v2\""} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
 1060:                                        "foo eval '{ok, V} = application:get_env(goal_app, var1), V.'"]),
 1061:                        [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
 1062:                         {"NODENAME", "node2"},
 1063:                         {"COOKIE", "cookie2"}]),
 1064:     {ok, "\"node2\""} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
 1065:                                      "foo eval '[Node,_] = re:split(atom_to_list(node()), \"@\"),binary_to_list(Node).'"]),
 1066:                           [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
 1067:                            {"NODENAME", "node2"},
 1068:                            {"COOKIE", "cookie2"}]),
 1069:     {ok, "cookie2"} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
 1070:                                        "foo eval 'erlang:get_cookie().'"]),
 1071:                         [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
 1072:                          {"NODENAME", "node2"},
 1073:                          {"COOKIE", "cookie2"}]),
 1074:     {ok, _Node2} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin",
 1075:                                        "foo eval 'atom_to_list(node()).'"]),
 1076:                          [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
 1077:                           {"NODENAME", "node2"},
 1078:                           {"COOKIE", "cookie2"}]),
 1079:     %% check that the replaced files have been created in the right place
 1080:     ?assert(ec_file:exists(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "releases", "0.0.1",
 1081:                                           "sys.config"]))),
 1082:     {ok, _} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo stop"]),
 1083:                 [{"RELX_REPLACE_OS_VARS", "1"},
 1084:                  {"NODENAME", "node2"},
 1085:                  {"COOKIE", "cookie2"}]),

 1087: 
 1088: custom_start_script_hooks(Config) ->
 1089:     LibDir1 = proplists:get_value(lib1, Config),
 1090: 
 1091:     rlx_test_utils:create_app(LibDir1, "goal_app", "0.0.1", [stdlib,kernel], []),
 1092: 
 1093:     ConfigFile = filename:join([LibDir1, "relx.config"]),
 1094:     rlx_test_utils:write_config(ConfigFile,
 1095:                  [{release, {foo, "0.0.1"},
 1096:                    [goal_app]},
 1097:                   {lib_dirs, [filename:join(LibDir1, "*")]},
 1098:                   {generate_start_script, true},
 1099:                   {extended_start_script, true},
 1100:                   {extended_start_script_hooks, [
 1101:                         {pre_start, [
 1102:                           {custom, "hooks/pre_start"}
 1103:                         ]},
 1104:                         {post_start, [
 1105:                           {custom, "hooks/post_start"}
 1106:                         ]},
 1107:                         {pre_stop, [
 1108:                           {custom, "hooks/pre_stop"}
 1109:                         ]},
 1110:                         {post_stop, [
 1111:                           {custom, "hooks/post_stop"}
 1112:                         ]}
 1113:                     ]},
 1114:                   {mkdir, "scripts"},
 1115:                   {overlay, [{copy, "./pre_start", "bin/hooks/pre_start"},
 1116:                              {copy, "./post_start", "bin/hooks/post_start"},
 1117:                              {copy, "./pre_stop", "bin/hooks/pre_stop"},
 1118:                              {copy, "./post_stop", "bin/hooks/post_stop"}]}
 1119:                  ]),
 1120: 
 1121:     %% write the hook scripts, each of them will write an erlang term to a file
 1122:     %% that will later be consulted
 1123:     ok = file:write_file(filename:join([LibDir1, "./pre_start"]),
 1124:                          "#!/bin/bash\n# $*\necho \\{pre_start, $REL_NAME, \\'$NAME\\', $COOKIE\\}. >> test"),
 1125:     ok = file:write_file(filename:join([LibDir1, "./post_start"]),
 1126:                          "#!/bin/bash\n# $*\necho \\{post_start, $REL_NAME, \\'$NAME\\', $COOKIE\\}. >> test"),
 1127:     ok = file:write_file(filename:join([LibDir1, "./pre_stop"]),
 1128:                          "#!/bin/bash\n# $*\necho \\{pre_stop, $REL_NAME, \\'$NAME\\', $COOKIE\\}. >> test"),
 1129:     ok = file:write_file(filename:join([LibDir1, "./post_stop"]),
 1130:                          "#!/bin/bash\n# $*\necho \\{post_stop, $REL_NAME, \\'$NAME\\', $COOKIE\\}. >> test"),
 1131: 
 1132:     OutputDir = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1133:                                rlx_test_utils:create_random_name("relx-output")]),
 1134:     {ok, _State} = relx:do(foo, undefined, [], [LibDir1], 3,
 1135:                            OutputDir, ConfigFile),
 1136:     %% now start/stop the release to make sure the script hooks are really getting
 1137:     %% executed
 1138:     os:cmd(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo start"])),
 1139:     timer:sleep(2000),
 1140:     os:cmd(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo stop"])),
 1141:     %% now check that the output file contains the expected format
 1142:     {ok,[{pre_start, foo, _, foo},
 1143:          {post_start, foo, _, foo},
 1144:          {pre_stop, foo, _, foo},
 1145:          {post_stop, foo, _, foo}]} = file:consult(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "test"])).
 1146: 
 1147: builtin_pid_start_script_hook(Config) ->
 1148:     LibDir1 = proplists:get_value(lib1, Config),
 1149: 
 1150:     rlx_test_utils:create_app(LibDir1, "goal_app", "0.0.1", [stdlib,kernel], []),
 1151: 
 1152:     ConfigFile = filename:join([LibDir1, "relx.config"]),
 1153: 
 1154:     OutputDir = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1155:                                rlx_test_utils:create_random_name("relx-output")]),
 1156: 
 1157:     rlx_test_utils:write_config(ConfigFile,
 1158:                  [{release, {foo, "0.0.1"},
 1159:                    [goal_app]},
 1160:                   {lib_dirs, [filename:join(LibDir1, "*")]},
 1161:                   {generate_start_script, true},
 1162:                   {extended_start_script, true},
 1163:                   {extended_start_script_hooks, [
 1164:                       {post_start, [
 1165:                         {pid, filename:join([OutputDir, "foo.pid"])}
 1166:                       ]}
 1167:                   ]}
 1168:                  ]),
 1169: 
 1170:     {ok, _State} = relx:do(foo, undefined, [], [LibDir1], 3,
 1171:                            OutputDir, ConfigFile),
 1172:     %% now start/stop the release to make sure the script hooks are really getting
 1173:     %% executed
 1174:     os:cmd(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo start"])),
 1175:     %% check that the pid file really was created
 1176:     ?assert(ec_file:exists(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo.pid"]))),
 1177:     os:cmd(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo stop"])),
 1178:     ok.
 1179: 
 1180: builtin_wait_for_vm_start_script_hook(Config) ->
 1181:     LibDir1 = proplists:get_value(lib1, Config),
 1182: 
 1183:     rlx_test_utils:create_app(LibDir1, "goal_app", "0.0.1", [stdlib,kernel], []),
 1184: 
 1185:     ConfigFile = filename:join([LibDir1, "relx.config"]),
 1186:     rlx_test_utils:write_config(ConfigFile,
 1187:                  [{release, {foo, "0.0.1"},
 1188:                    [goal_app]},
 1189:                   {lib_dirs, [filename:join(LibDir1, "*")]},
 1190:                   {generate_start_script, true},
 1191:                   {extended_start_script, true},
 1192:                   {extended_start_script_hooks, [
 1193:                         {post_start, [wait_for_vm_start]}
 1194:                     ]}
 1195:                  ]),
 1196: 
 1197:     OutputDir = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1198:                                rlx_test_utils:create_random_name("relx-output")]),
 1199:     {ok, _State} = relx:do(foo, undefined, [], [LibDir1], 3,
 1200:                            OutputDir, ConfigFile),
 1201:     %% now start/stop the release to make sure the script hooks are really getting
 1202:     %% executed
 1203:     os:cmd(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo start"])),
 1204:     % this run doesn't need the sleep because the wait_for_vm_start
 1205:     % start script makes it unnecessary
 1206:     %timer:sleep(2000),
 1207:     {ok, "pong"} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo ping"])),
 1208:     os:cmd(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo stop"])),
 1209:     ok.
 1210: 
 1211: builtin_wait_for_process_start_script_hook(Config) ->
 1212:     LibDir1 = proplists:get_value(lib1, Config),
 1213: 
 1214:     rlx_test_utils:create_full_app(LibDir1, "goal_app", "0.0.1",
 1215:                                    [stdlib,kernel], []),
 1216: 
 1217:     ConfigFile = filename:join([LibDir1, "relx.config"]),
 1218:     rlx_test_utils:write_config(ConfigFile,
 1219:                  [{release, {foo, "0.0.1"},
 1220:                    [goal_app]},
 1221:                   {lib_dirs, [filename:join(LibDir1, "*")]},
 1222:                   {generate_start_script, true},
 1223:                   {extended_start_script, true},
 1224:                   {extended_start_script_hooks, [
 1225:                         {post_start, [wait_for_vm_start,
 1226:                                      {wait_for_process, goal_app_srv_signal}]}
 1227:                     ]}
 1228:                  ]),
 1229: 
 1230:     OutputDir = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1231:                                rlx_test_utils:create_random_name("relx-output")]),
 1232:     {ok, _State} = relx:do(foo, undefined, [], [LibDir1], 3,
 1233:                            OutputDir, ConfigFile),
 1234:     %% now start/stop the release to make sure the script hooks are really getting
 1235:     %% executed
 1236:     %% get the current time, we'll measure how long it took for the node to
 1237:     %% start, it must be at least 3 seconds which is the time it takes the
 1238:     %% goal_app_srv to register the signal
 1239:     T1 = os:timestamp(),
 1240:     os:cmd(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo start"])),
 1241:     T2 = timer:now_diff(os:timestamp(), T1),
 1242:     {ok, "pong"} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo ping"])),
 1243:     os:cmd(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo stop"])),
 1244:     ?assert((T2 div 1000) > 3000),
 1245:     ok.
 1246: 
 1247: mixed_custom_and_builtin_start_script_hooks(Config) ->
 1248:     LibDir1 = proplists:get_value(lib1, Config),
 1249: 
 1250:     rlx_test_utils:create_full_app(LibDir1, "goal_app", "0.0.1",
 1251:                                    [stdlib,kernel], []),
 1252: 
 1253:     OutputDir = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1254:                                rlx_test_utils:create_random_name("relx-output")]),
 1255: 
 1256:     ConfigFile = filename:join([LibDir1, "relx.config"]),
 1257:     rlx_test_utils:write_config(ConfigFile,
 1258:                  [{release, {foo, "0.0.1"},
 1259:                    [goal_app]},
 1260:                   {lib_dirs, [filename:join(LibDir1, "*")]},
 1261:                   {generate_start_script, true},
 1262:                   {extended_start_script, true},
 1263:                   {extended_start_script_hooks, [
 1264:                         {pre_start, [
 1265:                           {custom, "hooks/pre_start"}
 1266:                         ]},
 1267:                         {post_start, [
 1268:                           wait_for_vm_start,
 1269:                           {pid, filename:join([OutputDir, "foo.pid"])},
 1270:                           {wait_for_process, goal_app_srv_signal},
 1271:                           {custom, "hooks/post_start"}
 1272:                         ]},
 1273:                         {pre_stop, [
 1274:                           {custom, "hooks/pre_stop"}
 1275:                         ]},
 1276:                         {post_stop, [
 1277:                           {custom, "hooks/post_stop"}
 1278:                         ]}
 1279:                     ]},
 1280:                   {mkdir, "scripts"},
 1281:                   {overlay, [{copy, "./pre_start", "bin/hooks/pre_start"},
 1282:                              {copy, "./post_start", "bin/hooks/post_start"},
 1283:                              {copy, "./pre_stop", "bin/hooks/pre_stop"},
 1284:                              {copy, "./post_stop", "bin/hooks/post_stop"}]}
 1285:                  ]),
 1286: 
 1287:     %% write the hook scripts, each of them will write an erlang term to a file
 1288:     %% that will later be consulted
 1289:     ok = file:write_file(filename:join([LibDir1, "./pre_start"]),
 1290:                          "#!/bin/bash\n# $*\necho \\{pre_start, $REL_NAME, \\'$NAME\\', $COOKIE\\}. >> test"),
 1291:     ok = file:write_file(filename:join([LibDir1, "./post_start"]),
 1292:                          "#!/bin/bash\n# $*\necho \\{post_start, $REL_NAME, \\'$NAME\\', $COOKIE\\}. >> test"),
 1293:     ok = file:write_file(filename:join([LibDir1, "./pre_stop"]),
 1294:                          "#!/bin/bash\n# $*\necho \\{pre_stop, $REL_NAME, \\'$NAME\\', $COOKIE\\}. >> test"),
 1295:     ok = file:write_file(filename:join([LibDir1, "./post_stop"]),
 1296:                          "#!/bin/bash\n# $*\necho \\{post_stop, $REL_NAME, \\'$NAME\\', $COOKIE\\}. >> test"),
 1297: 
 1298:     {ok, _State} = relx:do(foo, undefined, [], [LibDir1], 3,
 1299:                            OutputDir, ConfigFile),
 1300:     %% now start/stop the release to make sure the script hooks are really getting
 1301:     %% executed
 1302:     %% get the current time, we'll measure how long it took for the node to
 1303:     %% start, it must be at least 3 seconds which is the time it takes the
 1304:     %% goal_app_srv to register the signal
 1305:     T1 = os:timestamp(),
 1306:     os:cmd(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo start"])),
 1307:     % this run doesn't need the sleep because the wait_for_vm_start
 1308:     % start script makes it unnecessary
 1309:     T2 = timer:now_diff(os:timestamp(), T1),
 1310:     {ok, "pong"} = sh(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo ping"])),
 1311:     ?assert((T2 div 1000) > 3000),
 1312:     %% check that the pid file really was created
 1313:     ?assert(ec_file:exists(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo.pid"]))),
 1314:     os:cmd(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "bin", "foo stop"])),
 1315:     %% now check that the output file contains the expected format
 1316:     {ok,[{pre_start, foo, _, foo},
 1317:          {post_start, foo, _, foo},
 1318:          {pre_stop, foo, _, foo},
 1319:          {post_stop, foo, _, foo}]} = file:consult(filename:join([OutputDir, "foo", "test"])).
 1320: 
 1321: %%%===================================================================
 1322: %%% Helper Functions
 1323: %%%===================================================================
 1324: 
 1325: sh(Command) ->
 1326:     sh(Command, []).
 1327: 
 1328: sh(Command, Env) ->
 1329:     sh(Command, Env, get_cwd()).
 1330: 
 1331: sh(Command, Env, Dir) ->
 1332:     Port = open_port({spawn, lists:flatten(Command)},
 1333:                      [{cd, Dir},
 1334:                       {env, Env},
 1335:                       exit_status,
 1336:                       {line, 16384},
 1337:                       use_stdio, stderr_to_stdout]),
 1338:     case sh_loop(Port) of
 1339:         {ok, Ret} ->
 1340:             {ok, Ret};
 1341:         {error, Rc, Msg} ->
 1342:             {error, Rc, Msg}
 1343:     end.
 1344: 
 1345: sh_loop(Port) ->
 1346:     sh_loop(Port, "").
 1347: 
 1348: sh_loop(Port, Acc) ->
 1349:     receive
 1350:         {Port, {data, {_, Line}}} ->
 1351:             sh_loop(Port, Acc ++ Line);
 1352:         {Port, {exit_status, 0}} ->
 1353:             {ok, Acc};
 1354:         {Port, {exit_status, Rc}} ->
 1355:             {error, Rc, Acc}
 1356:     end.
 1357: 
 1358: get_cwd() ->
 1359:     {ok, Dir} = file:get_cwd(),
 1360:     Dir.
